tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Manuscripts (
    manuscript_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    manuscript_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    author_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    editor_id INT REFERENCES Reviewers(reviewer_id),
    status TEXT DEFAULT 'Pending'
);
CREATE TABLE reviewers (reviewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, reviewer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, assigned_manuscripts INT)
CREATE TABLE manuscripts (manuscript_id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, abstract TEXT, author_id INT, editor_id INT, status VARCHAR(20))
CREATE TABLE authors (author_id INT PRIMARY KEY, author_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, submitted_manuscripts INT)
CREATE TABLE editors (editor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, editor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, assigned_manuscripts INT)
CREATE TABLE comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, manuscript_id INT, reviewer_id INT, comment_text TEXT, comment_date TIMESTAMP)
